verses.verse: God, <S%H430><s%> why have you rejected <S%H2186><s%> us forever? <S%H5331><s%> Why does your anger <S%H639><s%> smolder <S%H6225><s%> against the sheep <S%H6629><s%> of your pasture? <S%H4830><s%>

Remember <S%H2142><s%> your congregation, <S%H5712><s%> which you purchased <S%H7069><s%> of old, <S%H6924><s%> which <S%H7626><s%> you have redeemed <S%H1350><s%> to be the tribe of your inheritance; <S%H5159><s%> Mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion, <S%H6726><s%> in which you have lived. <S%H7931><s%>
Lift up <S%H7311><s%> your feet <S%H6471><s%> to the perpetual <S%H5331><s%> ruins, <S%H4876><s%> all the evil <S%H7489><s%> that the enemy <S%H341><s%> has done in the sanctuary. <S%H6944><s%>
Your adversaries <S%H6887><s%> have roared <S%H7580><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of your assembly. <S%H4150><s%> They have set up <S%H7760><s%> their standards <S%H226><s%> as signs. <S%H226><s%>
They behaved <S%H3045><s%> like men wielding <S%H935><s%> axes, <S%H7134><s%> cutting through a thicket <S%H5442><s%> of trees. <S%H6086><s%>
Now <S%H3162><s%> they break all its carved work <S%H6603><s%> down <S%H1986><s%> with hatchet <S%H3781><s%> and hammers. <S%H3597><s%>
They have <S%H7971><s%> burned <S%H784><s%> your sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> to the ground. <S%H776><s%> They have profaned <S%H2490><s%> the dwelling place <S%H4908><s%> of your Name. <S%H8034><s%>

They said <S%H559><s%> in their heart, <S%H3820><s%> "We will crush <S%H3238><s%> them completely. <S%H3162><s%>" They have burned up <S%H8313><s%> all the places <S%H4150><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> where God was worshiped. <S%H410><s%>
We see <S%H7200><s%> no miraculous signs. <S%H226><s%> There is no longer any prophet, <S%H5030><s%> neither is there among us anyone who knows <S%H3045><s%> how long. <S%H5704><s%>
How long, <S%H430><s%> God, shall the adversary <S%H6862><s%> reproach? <S%H2778><s%> Shall the enemy <S%H341><s%> blaspheme <S%H5006><s%> your name <S%H8034><s%> forever? <S%H5331><s%>
Why do you draw <S%H7725><s%> back your hand, <S%H3027><s%> even your right hand? <S%H3027><s%> Take <S%H3615><s%> it out of <S%H7130><s%> your pocket and consume them! <S%H2436><s%>
Yet God <S%H430><s%> is my King <S%H4428><s%> of old, <S%H6924><s%> working <S%H6466><s%> salvation <S%H3444><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>
You divided <S%H6565><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> by your strength. <S%H5797><s%> You broke <S%H7665><s%> the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the sea monsters <S%H8577><s%> in the waters. <S%H4325><s%>
You broke <S%H7533><s%> the heads <S%H7218><s%> of Leviathan <S%H3882><s%> in pieces. <S%H5414><s%> You gave him as food <S%H3978><s%> to people <S%H5971><s%> and desert creatures. <S%H6728><s%>
You opened <S%H1234><s%> up spring <S%H4599><s%> and stream. <S%H5158><s%> You dried up <S%H3001><s%> mighty <S%H386><s%> rivers. <S%H5104><s%>
The day <S%H3117><s%> is yours, <S%H3915><s%> the night is also yours. <S%H3559><s%> You have prepared the light <S%H3974><s%> and the sun. <S%H8121><s%>
You have set <S%H5324><s%> all the boundaries <S%H1367><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%> You have made <S%H3335><s%> summer <S%H7019><s%> and winter. <S%H2779><s%>

Remember <S%H2142><s%> this, <S%H341><s%> that the enemy has mocked <S%H2778><s%> you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh. Foolish <S%H5036><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> have blasphemed <S%H5006><s%> your name. <S%H8034><s%>

Don't <S%H5414><s%> deliver the soul <S%H5315><s%> of your dove <S%H8449><s%> to wild beasts. <S%H2416><s%> Don't <S%H7911><s%> forget the life <S%H2416><s%> of your poor <S%H6041><s%> forever. <S%H5331><s%>
Honor <S%H5027><s%> your covenant, <S%H1285><s%> for haunts <S%H4285><s%> of violence <S%H2555><s%> fill the dark <S%H4285><s%> places <S%H4999><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>
Don't <S%H1790><s%> let the oppressed return <S%H7725><s%> ashamed. <S%H3637><s%> Let the poor <S%H6041><s%> and needy <S%H34><s%> praise <S%H1984><s%> your name. <S%H8034><s%>
Arise, <S%H6965><s%> God! <S%H430><s%> Plead <S%H7378><s%> your own cause. <S%H7379><s%> Remember <S%H2142><s%> how the foolish man <S%H5036><s%> mocks <S%H2781><s%> you all day. <S%H3117><s%>

Don't <S%H7911><s%> forget the voice <S%H6963><s%> of your adversaries. <S%H6887><s%> The tumult <S%H7588><s%> of those who rise up <S%H6965><s%> against you ascends <S%H5927><s%> continually. <S%H8548><s%>
